ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class Splash

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.Splash

  • public class Splash
extends Activity
    Splash activity, just shows splash screen and after a certain time or a tap on screen activity switch to SmsAlarm.
    Since:
    2.1
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm
    See Also:
    onCreate(Bundle)
